title: Cannot start mRemoteNG due to an unhandled exception while loading the configuration
author: zgabi
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
mRemoteNG should start

## Current Behavior
Process terminates. Exception written to Windows event log:
"the process was terminated due to an unhandled exception"

Original Exception in hungarian:
Alkalmazás: mRemoteNG.exe
Keretrendszer verziószáma: v4.0.30319
Leírás: A folyamat egy nem kezelt kivétel miatt meg lett szakítva.
Kivétel adatai: System.Xml.XmlException
   a következő helyen: System.Xml.XmlTextReaderImpl.Throw(System.Exception)
   a következő helyen:...

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
